title: PIER / CINDY
description: You run across an aspiring graffito artist. She can serve as an introduction to Joyce, and also tells you a little about crime in Martinaise. You can get a brush from her to use on the mother of all walls, and an idea for what to use as paint.

dialogueTree.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Hello again, officers. Have you co..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again, officers. Have you come to admire my mural?"

dialogueTree.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Ooh, the piggies have learned how..."
dialogueTree.text: "Ooh, the piggies have learned how to saunter up staircases. I didn't think you could do that with hooves. But -- here you are."

links.title: You: ""That's right. We've evolved.""
links.text: "That's right. We've evolved."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yeah, I can see that. Cool mutatio..."
links.text: "Yeah, I can see that. Cool mutations." She crosses her arms.

links.title: You: ""You're in trouble now, little lady!""
links.text: "You're in trouble now, little lady!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yes, Uncle Maynard. *Huge* trouble..."
links.text: "Yes, Uncle Maynard. *Huge* trouble." She crosses her arms. "You're going to take out your metal detector and your collection of bottle caps and shrapnel."

links.title: You: ""We cops don't *like* closed doors..."
links.text: "We cops don't *like* closed doors or unreachable perches. Or people having high ground on us."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yeah, you got me now. The dynamic..."
links.text: "Yeah, you got me now. The dynamic between us has completely changed." She crosses her arms.

links.title: You: ""I don't have time for this." [Leav..."
links.text: "I don't have time for this." [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""The streets will flow red once mor..."
dialogueTree.text: "The streets will flow red once more. A great torrent, rushing down Rue d'Esperance. You wait and see." The girl stares at the sailboat by the pier.

dialogueTree.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Hello again, officers. Have you co..."
dialogueTree.text: "Hello again, officers. Have you come to admire my mural?"

links.title: You: ""You keep looking off to the side -..."
links.text: "You keep looking off to the side -- what are you looking at?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She nods disdainfully toward the wo..."
links.text: She nods disdainfully toward the woman performing maintenance on the boat docked next to the pier.

links.title: Composure: "Hatred? Disgust? It's difficult to..."
links.text: Hatred? Disgust? It's difficult to tell which of the two is more present in her girlish features.

links.title: Joyce Messier: "The woman on the boat does not noti..."
links.text: The woman on the boat does not notice her staring.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She hisses: "That Ozonne whore. *So..."
links.text: She hisses: "That Ozonne whore. *Someone's* gotta keep an eye on her."

links.title: You: ""You mean Joyce?'"
links.text: "You mean Joyce?'

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""On a first-name basis with her, ar..."
links.text: "On a first-name basis with her, are we? Piggy's moving up in the world."

links.title: You: ""Hold on. What's Ozonne?""
links.text: "Hold on. What's Ozonne?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""It's where they grow whores like h..."
links.text: "It's where they grow whores like her, and their whore men."

links.title: You: ""Why all the negativity?""
links.text: "Why all the negativity?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Have you got a crush on her? Achin..."
links.text: "Have you got a crush on her? Aching for an opportunity to defend her honour?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I don't like her either.""
links.text: "Yeah, I don't like her either."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Pig's not half as dumb as he looks..."
links.text: "Pig's not half as dumb as he looks." She gives you a stately nod of approval.

links.title: You: ""The Wild Pines rep?""
links.text: "The Wild Pines rep?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. We should go talk to her." He..."
links.text: "Yes. We should go talk to her." He nods in her direction. "She's a professional negotiator, though. I have the feeling she will be very cooperative -- while telling us nothing."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You should take the lead, ask her..."
links.text: "You should take the lead, ask her unexpected questions -- you know, do your thing. Don't be afraid to get a bit *wacky*. Throwing her off is our best bet."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Good idea, piggies. Run along now,..."
links.text: "Good idea, piggies. Run along now, fuck her shit up good. Impound that boat while you're at it. I'd like to watch her *swim* back to Ozonne."

links.title: You: ""Who is she?""
links.text: "Who is she?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Probably the Wild Pines rep. We sh..."
links.text: "Probably the Wild Pines rep. We should talk to her." He nods in her direction. "She's a professional negotiator, though. I have the feeling she will be very cooperative -- while telling us nothing."

links.title: You: ""You mean Joyce?'"
links.text: "You mean Joyce?'

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""On a first-name basis with her, ar..."
links.text: "On a first-name basis with her, are we? Piggy's moving up in the world."

links.title: You: ""Hold on. What's Ozonne?""
links.text: "Hold on. What's Ozonne?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""It's where they grow whores like t..."
links.text: "It's where they grow whores like that one over there, and their whore men."

links.title: You: ""Why all the negativity?""
links.text: "Why all the negativity?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Have you got a crush on her? Achin..."
links.text: "Have you got a crush on her? Aching for an opportunity to defend her honour?"

links.title: You: ""Yeah, I don't like her either.""
links.text: "Yeah, I don't like her either."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Pig's not half as dumb as he looks..."
links.text: "Pig's not half as dumb as he looks." She gives you a stately nod of approval.

links.title: You: ""That's the Wild Pines rep, right?""
links.text: "That's the Wild Pines rep, right?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Madame Professional Negotiator in..."
links.text: "Madame Professional Negotiator in the flesh -- and the flimsy linen." She narrows her eyes. "Something morbid about old ladies trying to look young."

links.title: Conceptualization: "That's rich coming from a young gir..."
links.text: That's rich coming from a young girl dressed up like a granny.

links.title: You: ""Aren't you a young lady trying to..."
links.text: "Aren't you a young lady trying to look old?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Oh, but that's the way it should b..."
links.text: "Oh, but that's the way it should be. The natural order of things."

links.title: You: ""Who is she?""
links.text: "Who is she?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Isn't it part of your job to know..."
links.text: "Isn't it part of your job to know all the illustrious personages 'round this shithole? She's the Wild Pines representative. Madame Professional Negotiator in the flesh -- and the flimsy linen." Her eyes narrow to slits.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Something morbid about old ladies..."
links.text: "Something morbid about old ladies trying to look young."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Ozonne is an archipelago two days'..."
links.text: Ozonne is an archipelago two days' travel away from Revachol. Its moneyed residents, used to posh restaurants and upscale boutiques, rarely have reason to visit Martinaise.

links.title: You: ""What are you doing to the wall?""
links.text: "What are you doing to the wall?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Can't you tell? I'm painting a bea..."
links.text: "Can't you tell? I'm painting a beautiful mural. An aero-graffito visible from low orbit..."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I haven't really started it yet. I..."
links.text: "I haven't really started it yet. I'm waiting for the right words." She studies the wall, suddenly pensive.

links.title: You: ""So you don't know what to write?""
links.text: "So you don't know what to write?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Have you ever tried your hand at g..."
links.text: "Have you ever tried your hand at graffito? When faced with a blank wall, most people write unimaginative stuff like *Pigs Go Home* and *Mona was here*."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""We rarely see pigs 'round here, th..."
links.text: "We rarely see pigs 'round here, though, just Union cads -- and my name's not Mona, so..."

links.title: Empathy: "She wants it to be something true -..."
links.text: She wants it to be something true -- and *total*.

links.title: You: ""Why are you so committed to defaci..."
links.text: "Why are you so committed to defacing the building?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""This place is severely lacking in..."
links.text: "This place is severely lacking in havoc. Not even the occasional trash can fire to break up the tedium."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I thought I'd mix it up, you know,..."
links.text: "I thought I'd mix it up, you know, summon the forces of crime and social chaos -- with a wall-sized invitation."

links.title: You: ""I have an opinion on this -- wanna..."
links.text: "I have an opinion on this -- wanna hear it?" (Proceed.)

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yeah?""
links.text: "Yeah?"

links.title: You: ""I like public art. Keep doing what..."
links.text: "I like public art. Keep doing what you're doing, don't mind me."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Thanks. I'm sure the inspiration w..."
links.text: "Thanks. I'm sure the inspiration will come to me now that I have an official RCM stamp of approval."

links.title: Rhetoric: "She means the opposite."
links.text: She means the opposite.

links.title: Empathy: "You've *lessened* her desire to def..."
links.text: You've *lessened* her desire to deface the building.

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna have to stop you. This i..."
links.text: "I'm gonna have to stop you. This is hooliganism."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's be realistic. What are you g..."
links.text: "Let's be realistic. What are you going to do, climb up there?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You heard your partner, piggy. I'm..."
links.text: "You heard your partner, piggy. I'm unstoppable."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What are you gonna do, climb up he..."
links.text: "What are you gonna do, climb up here? I'm unstoppable."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "I don't condone the idea of using p..."
links.text: I don't condone the idea of using physical force on her. She's a *girl*.

links.title: You: ""Actually I don't have an opinion...."
links.text: "Actually I don't have an opinion. I lied."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Lying is cool, I guess." She absen..."
links.text: "Lying is cool, I guess." She absent-mindedly paints a red streak on her left cheek.

links.title: You: ""Do you know anything about the rec..."
links.text: "Do you know anything about the recent murder?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I ain't no snitch, pigstein." She..."
links.text: "I ain't no snitch, pigstein." She wrinkles her nose. "Go forth and forage in someone else's shit. No shortage of squealers in these parts."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually -- there is a shortage of..."
links.text: "Actually -- there is a shortage of people who talk to us in a normal, calm, informative manner."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""We weren't put on this earth to ma..."
links.text: "We weren't put on this earth to make your life pleasant, fuck-o."

links.title: You: ""Is that government fuel oil?""
links.text: "Is that government fuel oil?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What did you think I was using, aq..."
links.text: "What did you think I was using, aquarelles? Sucked it out of a cop's fuel tank myself -- back in Jamrock."

links.title: Empathy: "She really did it. She's proud of i..."
links.text: She really did it. She's proud of it, too.

links.title: You: ""Fumes are bad for you, okay.""
links.text: "Fumes are bad for you, okay."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Something to think about next time..."
links.text: "Something to think about next time you're driving around in your pretty little piggy carriage."

links.title: You: ""You'd better hand it over.""
links.text: "You'd better hand it over."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Or what? You'll shoot me down from..."
links.text: "Or what? You'll shoot me down from this ledge and pry the bucket from my dead hands?"

links.title: You: ""That's some clever cultural commen..."
links.text: "That's some clever cultural commentary."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You ain't seen nothing yet, piggy-..."
links.text: "You ain't seen nothing yet, piggy-boo."

links.title: You: ""Is that heavy fuel oil?""
links.text: "Is that heavy fuel oil?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Red-dyed heavy fuel oil intended f..."
links.text: "Red-dyed heavy fuel oil intended for exclusive use in government vehicles, to be precise," he says, studying the contents of Cindy's bucket.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What did you think I was using, aq..."
links.text: "What did you think I was using, aquarelles? This shit is pumped out of government vehicles."

links.title: Empathy: "She did it herself. Pumped it out...."
links.text: She did it herself. Pumped it out. She's proud of it, too.

links.title: You: ""Fumes are bad for you.""
links.text: "Fumes are bad for you."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Something to think about next time..."
links.text: "Something to think about next time you're driving around in your pretty little piggy-carriage."

links.title: You: ""This has to be illegal.""
links.text: "This has to be illegal."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Cite me the statute that says you..."
links.text: "Cite me the statute that says you can't paint murals with fuel oil, and I promise I'll cease and desist."

links.title: You: ""That's some pretty clever cultural..."
links.text: "That's some pretty clever cultural commentary."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You ain't seen nothing yet, piggy-..."
links.text: "You ain't seen nothing yet, piggy-boo."

links.title: You: ""Is that bed in the coal room yours?""
links.text: "Is that bed in the coal room yours?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Ooh. Not only have you found my ad..."
links.text: "Ooh. Not only have you found my address, you've discovered my biggest secret: I'm a coal miner."

links.title: Perception (Sight): "She *does* have eyes that seem to b..."
links.text: She *does* have eyes that seem to be smeared with coal.

links.title: You: ""Really? You're a miner?""
links.text: "Really? You're a miner?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yes. I keep hoping a shaft will co..."
links.text: "Yes. I keep hoping a shaft will collapse on me, but somehow it never happens."

links.title: You: ""Don't you have a real home?""
links.text: "Don't you have a real home?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Does anyone, in a city like this?"..."
links.text: "Does anyone, in a city like this?" she replies wistfully, looking around.

links.title: Empathy: "If there's pain about any particula..."
links.text: If there's pain about any particular home she's lost, she's buried it deep, fortified herself against it.

links.title: You: ""It's not the nicest place, but I g..."
links.text: "It's not the nicest place, but I guess it'll have to do."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""It doesn't *have to* do anything a..."
links.text: "It doesn't *have to* do anything at all. Nothing does." She looks at the paint dripping down the wall. "Like me. Right now, I'm doing nothing at all."

links.title: Conceptualization: "The inspiration will come to her on..."
links.text: The inspiration will come to her once *hell* is set loose on the streets. It's too calm right now.

links.title: You: ""Cool. I have other questions." (Co..."
links.text: "Cool. I have other questions." (Conclude.)

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Shoot, piggy. It's what you do, is..."
links.text: "Shoot, piggy. It's what you do, isn't?"

links.title: You: ""I found some drugs in the coal roo..."
links.text: "I found some drugs in the coal room. Yours?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""They just might be. Rough stuff. I..."
links.text: "They just might be. Rough stuff. If you take the ride, you'd be wise to buckle your little pig-belly up."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Her neurons must be on fire, the he..."
links.text: Her neurons must be on fire, the heat creating waves and ripples in all she sees -- above all, in her painting.

links.title: You: ""Does it make you see everything al..."
links.text: "Does it make you see everything all... art-like?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You really think I need to be high..."
links.text: "You really think I need to be high to see the world as art? Poor unimaginative piggy. How I wouldn't want to have *your* peepers."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "To hell with the art part, man. It'..."
links.text: To hell with the art part, man. It's all about the high anyway.

links.title: You: ""I like bumpy rides. Know where I c..."
links.text: "I like bumpy rides. Know where I can get more?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""We apologize, but we're currently..."
links.text: "We apologize, but we're currently *not buying the entrapment you're selling*. Please call again later. Thank you." She smiles at her own joke.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""If you're *really* interested then..."
links.text: "If you're *really* interested then I'm sorry," she whispers, "but I don't do anti-radiation drugs anymore so I don't know where to get them."

links.title: You: ""Where did you get these then?""
links.text: "Where did you get these then?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""From a guy on Boogie Street. Porta..."
links.text: "From a guy on Boogie Street. Porta Rosa. Go there after midnight and you can get all kinds of funny things. Veterans of the People's Pile selling their stash."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "She immediately regrets telling you..."
links.text: She immediately regrets telling you -- but it's too late.

links.title: Empathy: "Damn me and my affinity to farm ani..."
links.text: Damn me and my affinity to farm animals, she's probably thinking. She hopes the information is useless.

links.title: You: ""I'm gonna have to take you in, kid..."
links.text: "I'm gonna have to take you in, kid. For possession of drugs."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""In which case, they are not mine,..."
links.text: "In which case, they are not mine, and I have several witnesses who will corroborate my statement."

links.title: Authority: "This battle is not going to be wort..."
links.text: This battle is not going to be worth your while. Let little miss sass here be.

links.title: You: ""Pissf****t and Fuck the World send..."
links.text: "Pissf****t and Fuck the World send their best."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I don't believe it. I've never kno..."
links.text: "I don't believe it. I've never known those boys to have manners."

links.title: Empathy: "The bemusement in her voice doesn't..."
links.text: The bemusement in her voice doesn't fully mask genuine tenderness.

links.title: You: ""They seem to hold you in high este..."
links.text: "They seem to hold you in high esteem."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""They'll never be SKULLS. But..." S..."
links.text: "They'll never be SKULLS. But..." She softens. "But their hearts are in the right place."

links.title: You: ""SKULLS are cool. Can *I* be a SKUL..."
links.text: "SKULLS are cool. Can *I* be a SKULL?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Fat chance. But you *can* still do..."
links.text: "Fat chance. But you *can* still do your part to revitalize the neighbourhood."

links.title: You: ""Okay then. How's that?""
links.text: "Okay then. How's that?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She throws you a conspiratorial gla..."
links.text: She throws you a conspiratorial glance, then presses her finger to her lips and squints up at the sky -- as though straining to hear something in the distance.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Have you noticed the *quiet?* Ever..."
links.text: "Have you noticed the *quiet?* Every so often, you might hear a gunshot pierce the air somewhere in Jamrock. But in Martinaise? No gunshots, no sirens. The people are languishing in boredom and complacency."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""This place is a sepulcher. We'll p..."
links.text: "This place is a sepulcher. We'll paint it red. We bring the raucous -- you bring the sirens."

links.title: You: ""But I really want to be a SKULL.""
links.text: "But I really want to be a SKULL."

links.title: You: ""SKULLS are silly. What are you eve..."
links.text: "SKULLS are silly. What are you even trying to achieve?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She throws you a conspiratorial gla..."
links.text: She throws you a conspiratorial glance, then presses her finger to her lips and squints up at the sky -- as though straining to hear something in the distance.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Have you noticed the *quiet?* Ever..."
links.text: "Have you noticed the *quiet?* Every so often, you might hear a gunshot pierce the air somewhere in Jamrock. But in Martinaise? No gunshots, no sirens. The people are languishing in boredom and complacency."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""This place is a sepulcher. We'll p..."
links.text: "This place is a sepulcher. We'll paint it red. We bring the raucous -- you bring the sirens."

links.title: Rhetoric: "She's making a valiant effort to co..."
links.text: She's making a valiant effort to come off as a nihilist, but she's really just an angry little commie. No wonder she was talking about the streets flowing red -- that's what happened during the Revolution.

links.title: You: ""So tell me, what's it like being a..."
links.text: "So tell me, what's it like being a SKULL *and* a communist?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She sighs. "You got me, pigshit. I..."
links.text: She sighs. "You got me, pigshit. I don't make for a very good SKULL. I like animals too much. Simians and... pigs."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She shrugs. "But I'm still gonna wr..."
links.text: She shrugs. "But I'm still gonna write some damned good graffito on this wall."

links.title: Composure: "Her voice sounds different when she..."
links.text: Her voice sounds different when she speaks this candidly. Older somehow.

links.title: You: "Better not to."
links.text: Better not to.

links.title: Rhetoric: "She'd never admit to it anyway."
links.text: She'd never admit to it anyway.

links.title: Endurance: "In this vision of hers, you are mut..."
links.text: In this vision of hers, you are mutually opportunistic organisms. Growing like mould on the streets.

links.title: Suggestion: "What is it with these SKULLS and *c..."
links.text: What is it with these SKULLS and *cooperation*? They have to be the nicest violent street gang in Revachol West.

links.title: Conceptualization: "She's probably not a good example o..."
links.text: She's probably not a good example of the gang either. *Or* maybe these SKULLS are more of an art movement than a gang.

links.title: You: ""Got it. Enough of that then.""
links.text: "Got it. Enough of that then."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Thank you for passing on the messa..."
links.text: "Thank you for passing on the message -- now run along, piggy."

links.title: You: ""I think they're afraid of you.""
links.text: "I think they're afraid of you."

links.title: You: ""Maybe it's just SKULL solidarity.""
links.text: "Maybe it's just SKULL solidarity."

links.title: You: ""I made up the sending their best p..."
links.text: "I made up the sending their best part. But I did talk to them."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Figures. All of you are liars. The..."
links.text: "Figures. All of you are liars. They're such sweet boys, though, aren't they? My sweet, sweet wannabe-SKULLS. They'll never be accepted. But their hearts are in the right place."

links.title: You: ""So you won't talk about the murder..."
links.text: "So you won't talk about the murder -- but maybe you can tell me something about the murder victim's missing armour?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What do I care about some fucking..."
links.text: "What do I care about some fucking tin egg shells?"

links.title: You: ""Wait -- don't you wanna know how I..."
links.text: "Wait -- don't you wanna know how I knew to ask you?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Not particularly." Her eyes dart a..."
links.text: "Not particularly." Her eyes dart across the horizon. "I wanna keep this as brief as possible, you see. I want to return to painting the world *red*."

links.title: You: ""Piss and Fuck told me.""
links.text: "Piss and Fuck told me."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Fine. I don't care about those wan..."
links.text: "Fine. I don't care about those wannabe-SKULLS -- and I don't care about your armour."

links.title: Empathy: "The wannabe-SKULLS are dear to her...."
links.text: The wannabe-SKULLS are dear to her. The armour less so.

links.title: Composure: "She doesn't want to sound surprised..."
links.text: She doesn't want to sound surprised at anything you say.

links.title: You: ""Okay, so tell me what you know the..."
links.text: "Okay, so tell me what you know then."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I think you didn't hear me. Why wo..."
links.text: "I think you didn't hear me. Why would I care?"

links.title: You: ""You might find armour useful if th..."
links.text: "You might find armour useful if the streets flow red once more."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Ugh, alright, sad piggy. I'll give..."
links.text: "Ugh, alright, sad piggy. I'll give you this one -- I saw a little girl in the fishing village running around with military-grade hand-wear. Looked cute as hell."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Could that girl have been Little Li..."
links.text: Could that girl have been Little Lily? It's not a bad place to start.

links.title: You: ""I know a little girl in the villag..."
links.text: "I know a little girl in the village -- Little Lily."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Could've been her. Small kid with..."
links.text: "Could've been her. Small kid with giant white armoured hands. If you've seen one of them you've seen them all."

links.title: Logic: "There weren't any other small girls..."
links.text: There weren't any other small girls in the village.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""If you haven't been there, the vil..."
links.text: "If you haven't been there, the village is a shithole down the coast from the main plaza." She waves her hand in a general westward direction. "Have a good time."

links.title: You: ""And there's a little girl wearing..."
links.text: "And there's a little girl wearing the gloves there?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""No-no. That's all the snitching Ci..."
links.text: "No-no. That's all the snitching Cindy the SKULL does for today. Actually, I don't even know why I told you what I just told you..."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I have a weakness for animals. It'..."
links.text: "I have a weakness for animals. It's the animal-thing again. Damn it." She looks at you, a little sad suddenly.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Or a weakness for police officers,..."
links.text: "Or a weakness for police officers, miss." He makes a note in his notebook. "Thank you either way."

links.title: You: ""Got it.""
links.text: "Got it."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Piggy, I have no idea why I just t..."
links.text: "Piggy, I have no idea why I just told you that..." She looks at you, a little sad suddenly. "You look like a shaggy dog left in the rain for too long. I have a weakness for animals."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Ugh, alright, piggy. I'll give you..."
links.text: "Ugh, alright, piggy. I'll give you this one. I saw a little girl in the fishing village running around with military-grade hand-wear. Looked cute as hell."

links.title: You: ""Isn't armour... art? Art for the,..."
links.text: "Isn't armour... art? Art for the, uhm, body?"

links.title: You: ""C'mon Cindy, just help me out here.""
links.text: "C'mon Cindy, just help me out here."

links.title: You: ""Do you have any idea what happened..."
links.text: "Do you have any idea what happened to the hanged man's armour?"

links.title: You: ""Cindy, I need some paint. And your..."
links.text: "Cindy, I need some paint. And your brush too."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What for?""
links.text: "What for?"

links.title: You: ""I'm doing renovation. It's boring,..."
links.text: "I'm doing renovation. It's boring, but necessary."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""But boring. You're not using my lo..."
links.text: "But boring. You're not using my lovely brush to spread boredom."

links.title: You: ""For my motor carriage. We're going..."
links.text: "For my motor carriage. We're going undercover."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I ain't helping no pigs fool hones..."
links.text: "I ain't helping no pigs fool honest, upstanding citizens. I'm not an *antisocial element*."

links.title: You: ""The apocalypse is coming. I need t..."
links.text: "The apocalypse is coming. I need to warn people."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What do you think I'm trying to pa..."
links.text: "What do you think I'm trying to paint here -- a mural for a better tomorrow? Why do you really need it?"

links.title: You: ""For art. It's for art, okay?""
links.text: "For art. It's for art, okay?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Well, if it's for *art*... But..."..."
links.text: "Well, if it's for *art*... But..." Her eyes narrow to slits. "What kind of art are we talking about?"

links.title: You: ""To be honest, I haven't really tho..."
links.text: "To be honest, I haven't really thought of anything yet... But I'm sure I will."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Then you have time to find your ow..."
links.text: "Then you have time to find your own *fucking* brush."

links.title: You: ""Cool. No brush then. Not a problem.""
links.text: "Cool. No brush then. Not a problem."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You're about to cry internally, ar..."
links.text: "You're about to cry internally, aren't you piggy?" She utters a disapproving grunt. "Pathetic. Just give up, art isn't for you."

links.title: You: ""You'll see. You will *all* see and..."
links.text: "You'll see. You will *all* see and tremble."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yeah... Not gonna hold my breath,..."
links.text: "Yeah... Not gonna hold my breath, piggy. You look like you'd suck. At... everything really," she quickly adds.

links.title: You: ""To crush a man's dreams like that...."
links.text: "To crush a man's dreams like that... I hope you're happy."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""There, there, piggy," she says in..."
links.text: "There, there, piggy," she says in mock compassion. "I guess art just isn't really *you*. Cause you suck. In life. And in everything."

links.title: You: ""Everything is sad and shit and we..."
links.text: "Everything is sad and shit and we need art to make it okay. Just give me the brush."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Sounds like you're just about to l..."
links.text: "Sounds like you're just about to live out your self pity, not make a statement. I can't have shit art on my conscience."

links.title: You: ""*Grand* art. Art DeLuxe. The artsy..."
links.text: "*Grand* art. Art DeLuxe. The artsy-est, the most ground breaking, the..."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Let me stop you right there, piggy..."
links.text: "Let me stop you right there, piggy," she interjects, raising her hand. "You have no idea, do you? No idea -- no brush. Fuck off."

links.title: You: "Attempt to explain your artistic in..."
links.text: Attempt to explain your artistic intentions.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You don't have the skills to execut..."
links.text: You don't have the skills to execute something like this in practice, but, oh boy, the idea's going to blow her fucking mind!

links.title: You: ""I'm going to create a highly detai..."
links.text: "I'm going to create a highly detailed skeleton of an ancient bird that went extinct a hundred million years ago."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She squints her eyes..."
links.text: She squints her eyes...

links.title: You: ""And then I'm going to paint it red..."
links.text: "And then I'm going to paint it red using heavy fuel oil. And then I'm going to fucking light it on fire."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "Her lips move. "On fire?" she whisp..."
links.text: Her lips move. "On fire?" she whispers to herself.

links.title: You: ""It's the phoenix, get it? What do..."
links.text: "It's the phoenix, get it? What do you say?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She hunches her shoulders and throw..."
links.text: She hunches her shoulders and throws you a grim look. "I say, sod off. You don't have the technical skills to do that."

links.title: You: ""But I thought you'd like my idea!""
links.text: "But I thought you'd like my idea!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I like your idea. Should've though..."
links.text: "I like your idea. Should've thought of it myself. I don't need this kind of competition in my neighbourhood."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Damn, it was too strong."
links.text: Damn, it was too strong.

links.title: You: ""That's not fair!""
links.text: "That's not fair!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Such is the bloody law of the bloo..."
links.text: "Such is the bloody law of the bloody streets, you wankstain."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Oops, my apologies. I guess I was t..."
links.text: Oops, my apologies. I guess I was trying too hard...

links.title: Authority: "You're a police officer and a *grow..."
links.text: You're a police officer and a *grown up*. Why are you trying to impress her? Maybe try a different approach?

links.title: Authority: "You're a police officer and a *grow..."
links.text: You're a police officer and a *grown up*. Why are you trying to impress her? Maybe try a different approach? Like climbing up there...

links.title: You: ""But, Cindy, art is bigger than eit..."
links.text: "But, Cindy, art is bigger than either of us."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Then get your brush from fucking *..."
links.text: "Then get your brush from fucking *art*."

links.title: You: ""I didn't realize you were so petty..."
links.text: "I didn't realize you were so petty and insecure."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Insult me all you want. You're sti..."
links.text: "Insult me all you want. You're still an art cop sans art materials."

links.title: You: ""What's your problem?""
links.text: "What's your problem?"

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, was the image offensive..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, was the image offensive? Did you survive an avian attack as a child?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Didn't we all?""
links.text: "Didn't we all?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "They do say the painter always pain..."
links.text: They do say the painter always paints his own portrait.

links.title: You: ""I'm going to paint a self-portrait..."
links.text: "I'm going to paint a self-portrait, but sort of, you know, *from the inside*, to show people what it's like."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""That's pretty fucked up, even for..."
links.text: "That's pretty fucked up, even for you, piggo."

links.title: You: ""Stop belittling me, Cindy!""
links.text: "Stop belittling me, Cindy!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Stop quivering like jello, then yo..."
links.text: "Stop quivering like jello, then you won't get fucked."

links.title: Volition: "But that would mean he *doesn't* sa..."
links.text: But that would mean he *doesn't* say every pathetic thing that pops in his head.

links.title: You: ""What if I add some interpretive da..."
links.text: "What if I add some interpretive dance?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She looks you up and down. "I think..."
links.text: She looks you up and down. "I think everyone would rather you didn't."

links.title: You: ""Okay, I won't do that. Please just..."
links.text: "Okay, I won't do that. Please just give me some paint and a brush. I need to do some art."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You're a real sad sack, you know t..."
links.text: "You're a real sad sack, you know that? Go ahead, then." She drops the paintbrush at your feet. "Art it up. Just try not to hurt yourself. And *no self portraits*."

links.title: You: ""Thanks, Cindy." (Pick up the brush..."
links.text: "Thanks, Cindy." (Pick up the brush.)

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Sure, any time. Us *shit* artists..."
links.text: "Sure, any time. Us *shit* artists have to help one another." She looks down at the wall and frowns. "Besides, I was out of fuel oil anyway."

links.title: Authority: "She only gave it to you because she..."
links.text: She only gave it to you because she doesn't see you as competition.

links.title: Conceptualization: "The right idea is not coming to her..."
links.text: The right idea is not coming to her. It's excruciating.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Oh, but I'm all out of fuel oil.""
links.text: "Oh, but I'm all out of fuel oil."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You're a real sad sack, you know t..."
links.text: "You're a real sad sack, you know that? Go ahead, then." She drops her paintbrush into the puddle below. "Art it up. Just try not to hurt yourself. And *no self portraits*."

links.title: You: "Man, that's lame..."
links.text: Man, that's lame...

links.title: Conceptualization: "No-no. It's great."
links.text: No-no. It's great.

links.title: You: ""I've got you cornered! Hand over t..."
links.text: "I've got you cornered! Hand over that brush!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Ooh, police brutality. That's the..."
links.text: "Ooh, police brutality. That's the good stuff!"

links.title: Half Light: "How come you're letting this baby r..."
links.text: How come you're letting this baby rat run circles around you? End this *now*.

links.title: You: "(Get closer and stare her down.) "C..."
links.text: (Get closer and stare her down.) "Cindy, give me the goddamned brush."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Fine, take it, I'm all out of fuel..."
links.text: "Fine, take it, I'm all out of fuel oil anyway." She drops the paintbrush at your feet.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You know what you've got in that fu..."
links.text: You know what you've got in that fuel canister you scavenged from your Kineema? Red-dyed heavy fuel oil. Time to get to *proper* work, artiste.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You know what you should be able to..."
links.text: You know what you should be able to find in your government-issued vehicle? Red-dyed heavy fuel oil.

links.title: You: "Can't I just use paint?"
links.text: Can't I just use paint?

links.title: Conceptualization: "Are you kidding me? Fuel oil is so..."
links.text: Are you kidding me? Fuel oil is so much cooler. No way you're disfiguring that beautiful wall with something as pedestrian as ordinary *paint*!

links.title: You: ""Hey, Kim. Do you think you could l..."
links.text: "Hey, Kim. Do you think you could lend me some of your fuel oil?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My fuel oil is for my Kineema. Use..."
links.text: "My fuel oil is for my Kineema. Use your own fuel if you are unable to contain your artistic impulses, but please, leave my Kineema out of it."

links.title: You: ""Kim, my friend. Would you be willi..."
links.text: "Kim, my friend. Would you be willing to sacrifice some of your fuel oil for art?"

links.title: You: "Right on. No way I'm settling for p..."
links.text: Right on. No way I'm settling for paint if even children are painting with fuel oil.

links.title: Conceptualization: "That beautiful wall deserves nothin..."
links.text: That beautiful wall deserves nothing less.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You know what you've got in that fu..."
links.text: You know what you've got in that fuel canister you scavenged from your Kineema? Red-dyed heavy fuel oil. Paint and a brush -- you're ready to do this.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That fuel oil was marked red for u..."
links.text: "That fuel oil was marked red for use by government vehicles only." He looks at the empty bucket.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Oh well." He shrugs. "Nothing we c..."
links.text: "Oh well." He shrugs. "Nothing we can do about it now."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuel?" He looks at the empty bucke..."
links.text: "Fuel?" He looks at the empty bucket, then back at her, struck by a sudden realization.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That wasn't paint. It was heavy fu..."
links.text: "That wasn't paint. It was heavy fuel oil, marked red for use by government vehicles."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What'd you think I was using, aqua..."
links.text: "What'd you think I was using, aquarelles?"

links.title: You: ""Fuel?""
links.text: "Fuel?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yeah, fuel. What'd you think I was..."
links.text: "Yeah, fuel. What'd you think I was using, aquarelles?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""The government uses such a nice re..."
links.text: "The government uses such a nice red colour to mark its heavy fuel oil. I simply couldn't resist."

links.title: You: "(Stand your ground with a look of w..."
links.text: (Stand your ground with a look of weary determination.) "Cindy, I'm going to stand here till you hand over that paintbrush."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Have you got any kids? Because you..."
links.text: "Have you got any kids? Because you sound like the world's saddest dad right now."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""But, fine, take the brush. I'm all..."
links.text: "But, fine, take the brush. I'm all out of fuel oil anyway." She drops the paintbrush at your feet.

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry, but I'm going to have t..."
links.text: "I'm sorry, but I'm going to have to ask you again: Give me the brush, please."

links.title: You: "(Attempt to establish contact.) "He..."
links.text: (Attempt to establish contact.) "Hey, sister. Let's talk *politics* for a minute."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""And what do *you* know about polit..."
links.text: "And what do *you* know about politics?" She squints at you suspiciously.

links.title: You: ""I'm looking for comrades to help m..."
links.text: "I'm looking for comrades to help me fire up the Great Mazovian Sausage Grinder. Will you help me?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "The girl erupts in a cackle that se..."
links.text: The girl erupts in a cackle that seems like it should belong to a much older woman...

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Oh, that's very nice. The little p..."
links.text: "Oh, that's very nice. The little piggy wants to make sausages. Out of what, his little piggy friends?"

links.title: You: ""No, out of the bourgeoisie.""
links.text: "No, out of the bourgeoisie."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""So the little piggy is a big, bad..."
links.text: "So the little piggy is a big, bad communist now..."

links.title: You: ""That's what we need to talk about...."
links.text: "That's what we need to talk about. I don't *know* who I'm supposed to be making sausages out of!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""How sad. This little piggy doesn't..."
links.text: "How sad. This little piggy doesn't know very much, does he?"

links.title: You: "(Turn to Kim.) "Don't worry, Kim. I..."
links.text: (Turn to Kim.) "Don't worry, Kim. I would never make you into a sausage."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It was not a concern of mine." The..."
links.text: "It was not a concern of mine." The lieutenant blinks once.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "In the break room of Precinct 41, S..."
links.text: In the break room of Precinct 41, Sergeant Mack Torson is just now warming a grey sausage over an electric range. The oil in the pan hisses and pops. Torson is dabbing a spot off his pants when his partner, Satellite-Officer Chester McLaine enters, sniffs the air, and frowns...

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Good fucking god, Mack. What is th..."
links.text: "Good fucking god, Mack. What is that smell?"

links.title: Mack Torson: ""What, like you've never reheated l..."
links.text: "What, like you've never reheated leftovers in the break room?" He skewers the greasy sausage with a small fork and removes it to a limp paper plate.

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Hey, if you wanna dress that up, I..."
links.text: "Hey, if you wanna dress that up, I think there's still that old bottle of mustard logged in evidence..." He's already laughing at his own joke-in-progress.

links.title: Mack Torson: ""What, you mean the one Vic yoinked..."
links.text: "What, you mean the one Vic yoinked off..."

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""... that hobo in front of the Frit..."
links.text: "... that hobo in front of the Frittte? Hahaha!"

links.title: You: "Keep listening."
links.text: Keep listening.

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Now you got to ask yourself, Mack...."
links.text: "Now you got to ask yourself, Mack. Are you desperate enough for *hobo mustard*?"

links.title: Mack Torson: "Torson chews thoughtfully at his sa..."
links.text: Torson chews thoughtfully at his sausage for some time. "Hey, Chester, speaking of... do you think Harry ever solved his money situation, or do you think he's gone full hobocop?"

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""You mean, like, is he out there ri..."
links.text: "You mean, like, is he out there right now, sleeping in a storm drain, chasin' down rats for leads?"

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Yeah, I could see it. He's always..."
links.text: "Yeah, I could see it. He's always been weird about money stuff."

links.title: You: ""Okay, Cindy. Does that mean you'll..."
links.text: "Okay, Cindy. Does that mean you'll help me find the communists?"

links.title: Mack Torson: "Torson chews thoughtfully at his sa..."
links.text: Torson chews thoughtfully at his sausage for some time. "Hey, Chester, I've been wondering... do you think anybody's ever gone full hobocop?"

links.title: Chester McLaine: ""Like, *really* hobocopped? Nah, th..."
links.text: "Like, *really* hobocopped? Nah, that stuff's just an urban myth, Headless FALN Rider-level stuff..."

links.title: Chester McLaine: "He chuckles. "Doesn't mean Harry is..."
links.text: He chuckles. "Doesn't mean Harry isn't givin' it a good try, though."

links.title: You: "(Turn to Cindy.) "Okay, then. Will..."
links.text: (Turn to Cindy.) "Okay, then. Will you help me find the communists?"

links.title: You: ""That's right. I'm gonna make juicy..."
links.text: "That's right. I'm gonna make juicy sausage links out of the entire 41st Precinct."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "For the briefest instant, the lieut..."
links.text: For the briefest instant, the lieutenant's hand hesitates above the notebook he's scribbling in.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Wow. There's a proper *radical* pi..."
links.text: "Wow. There's a proper *radical* piggy."

links.title: You: ""One of the Union guys said there's..."
links.text: "One of the Union guys said there's someone trying to organize an *underground revolutionary cell*."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""An *underground cell*? My, my. Sou..."
links.text: "An *underground cell*? My, my. Sounds big time..."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Sure. I know someone who'd love to..."
links.text: "Sure. I know someone who'd love to talk that ideological stuff. You're looking for Steban."

links.title: You: ""Who's Steban?""
links.text: "Who's Steban?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""A right communist. Who runs a *meg..."
links.text: "A right communist. Who runs a *mega cool* and *very secret* meeting."

links.title: You: ""Does this 'Steban' happen to go ar..."
links.text: "Does this 'Steban' happen to go around in a white jacket?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""He might.""
links.text: "He might."

links.title: You: ""Will you help me find him?""
links.text: "Will you help me find him?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She pretends to think about it for..."
links.text: She pretends to think about it for a moment. "No."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant lets slip a sigh tha..."
links.text: The lieutenant lets slip a sigh that seems to suggest this turn was utterly predictable.

links.title: You: ""Come on, Cindy. From one communist..."
links.text: "Come on, Cindy. From one communist to another, help me out."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Oh, fine, I'll help. But first, I..."
links.text: "Oh, fine, I'll help. But first, I want something from *you*..."

links.title: Half Light: "She's got you by the balls, chief...."
links.text: She's got you by the balls, chief. And she intends to squeeze them.

links.title: You: ""What's that?""
links.text: "What's that?"

links.title: You: ""Is it money you want? Here, take s..."
links.text: "Is it money you want? Here, take some. I've got plenty." (Offer her 5 rel.)

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Keep your money. What I want from..."
links.text: "Keep your money. What I want from you's better than gold..."

links.title: Composure: "Don't look so deflated. Whatever sh..."
links.text: Don't look so deflated. Whatever she asks, you keep your chin up!

links.title: You: ""I guess I should just give up, the..."
links.text: "I guess I should just give up, then. Nothing *ever* works out for me."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""God, if he isn't the saddest pig i..."
links.text: "God, if he isn't the saddest pig in the world..."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Incidentally, 'The Saddest Pig in t..."
links.text: Incidentally, 'The Saddest Pig in the World' is the title of a popular Gottwaldian children's book, written and illustrated by Moritz Metzger. In '26 it received the prestigious *Kritikerpreis* for youth literature.

links.title: You: ""Just tell me what you want me to d..."
links.text: "Just tell me what you want me to do!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "A wicked grin extends across her fa..."
links.text: A wicked grin extends across her face.

links.title: Inland Empire: "A laughing skull. Death hilarious...."
links.text: A laughing skull. Death hilarious. This is gonna be baaaad...

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Oink for me, piggy. Just once.""
links.text: "Oink for me, piggy. Just once."

links.title: You: ""I'm not oinking for you.""
links.text: "I'm not oinking for you."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Be a good pig, now. No oink, no go..."
links.text: "Be a good pig, now. No oink, no goods."

links.title: You: ""Come on, this is no way to treat y..."
links.text: "Come on, this is no way to treat your revolutionary brother!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Wrong. This is exactly how I treat..."
links.text: "Wrong. This is exactly how I treat my little brother."

links.title: You: "(With gusto.) "Oink, oink!""
links.text: (With gusto.) "Oink, oink!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Wow. That was easier than I expect..."
links.text: "Wow. That was easier than I expected. It's almost like you've been *wanting* to do it this whole time..."

links.title: Volition: "A cool, damp feeling ripples throug..."
links.text: A cool, damp feeling ripples through you. You realise you needn't have rolled over quite so easily.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant, needless to say, is..."
links.text: The lieutenant, needless to say, is not impressed.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Sounds like you're really serious..."
links.text: "Sounds like you're really serious about meeting Steban. It's touching, sort of."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Steban's group meets only at night..."
links.text: "Steban's group meets only at night, in an old room in these apartments here. It just so happens you're in luck: Their weekly meeting is *tonight*."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Poke your snout around sometime af..."
links.text: "Poke your snout around sometime after 22.00 and you might just find them."

links.title: You: ""Wait, how am I supposed to get int..."
links.text: "Wait, how am I supposed to get into the apartments if I don't live there?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Use your little piggy brain. I'm s..."
links.text: "Use your little piggy brain. I'm sure *someone* will let you in..."

links.title: Authority: "But it won't be this one."
links.text: But it won't be this one.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Just not me.""
links.text: "Just not me."

links.title: You: ""Hold on, what else can you tell me..."
links.text: "Hold on, what else can you tell me about this Steban?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Just that he's a real communist. N..."
links.text: "Just that he's a real communist. Not like the play-acting you've been doing. The rest you'll have to see for yourself."

links.title: You: ""That's very helpful. Thank you, Ci..."
links.text: "That's very helpful. Thank you, Cindy."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Hold on. You didn't think it would..."
links.text: "Hold on. You didn't think it would be that easy, did you?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""See, Steban's a bit on the paranoi..."
links.text: "See, Steban's a bit on the paranoid side. He's got all these *mega secret passphrases*, to keep out infiltrators and the like. You can't join the meeting without one."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""*Ahem*..." The lieutenant clears h..."
links.text: "*Ahem*..." The lieutenant clears his throat.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not to interfere in your personal..."
links.text: "Not to interfere in your personal errand, but I wonder whether it might have something to do with that phrase Maana mentioned overhearing."

links.title: You: ""Wait, what phrase?""
links.text: "Wait, what phrase?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant consults his noteboo..."
links.text: The lieutenant consults his notebook. "'Remember Dobreva and Abadanaiz'."

links.title: You: ""Oh, right. Good thinking, Kim.""
links.text: "Oh, right. Good thinking, Kim."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods."
links.text: The lieutenant nods.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Guess this is what happens when tw..."
links.text: "Guess this is what happens when two pigs put their heads together..." She seems slightly disappointed.

links.title: You: ""I was *totally* about to say that.""
links.text: "I was *totally* about to say that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course you were, detective. Apo..."
links.text: "Of course you were, detective. Apologies for interrupting." The lieutenant smiles to himself.

links.title: Conceptualization: "No, you weren't. Otherwise you *wou..."
links.text: No, you weren't. Otherwise you *would have* said it. In truth, it was quite beyond your associative powers.

links.title: You: ""That's really dumb. You should fee..."
links.text: "That's really dumb. You should feel embarrassed even suggesting that."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You're right. How *foolish* of me...."
links.text: "You're right. How *foolish* of me. Won't happen again, detective."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Intra-piggy conflict. Very cool......"
links.text: "Intra-piggy conflict. Very cool..." For a moment her eyes appear to light up.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You should listen to your partner..."
links.text: "You should listen to your partner every once in a while. He's not so dim as you are."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hang on, could it have something to..."
links.text: Hang on, could it have something to do with that strange *inside-talk* the boiadeiro mentioned?

links.title: You: ""That's fine. I'm pretty sure it's..."
links.text: "That's fine. I'm pretty sure it's 'Remember Dobreva and Abadanaiz'."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Huh. I guess this little piggy has..."
links.text: "Huh. I guess this little piggy has done his legwork after all..." She sounds slightly disappointed.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""That's enough. Off with you then."..."
links.text: "That's enough. Off with you then." She makes a lazy shooing motion with her dangling hand.

links.title: You: ""But you're not going to tell me, a..."
links.text: "But you're not going to tell me, are you?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Why would I? That would be so bori..."
links.text: "Why would I? That would be so boring."

links.title: Logic: "That's fine. You don't need her to..."
links.text: That's fine. You don't need her to tell you, because you *already know it*.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Now, let's see if you're half as d..."
links.text: "Now, let's see if you're half as dedicated a communist as you say you are..."

links.title: You: ""Do you know the passphrase?""
links.text: "Do you know the passphrase?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Sure, I do. Steban trusts me.""
links.text: "Sure, I do. Steban trusts me."

links.title: You: ""But you're not going to tell me, a..."
links.text: "But you're not going to tell me, are you?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Why would I? That would be so bori..."
links.text: "Why would I? That would be so boring."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Now, let's see if you're half as d..."
links.text: "Now, let's see if you're half as dedicated a communist as you say you are..."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""That's enough. Off with you, then...."
links.text: "That's enough. Off with you, then." She makes a lazy shooing motion with her dangling hand.

links.title: You: ""Hmm, why do I feel like there's a..."
links.text: "Hmm, why do I feel like there's a catch..."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Oh, smart pig, because there *is*...."
links.text: "Oh, smart pig, because there *is*..."

links.title: You: "(Reluctantly.) "Oink, oink.""
links.text: (Reluctantly.) "Oink, oink."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""There, that wasn't so bad, was it?""
links.text: "There, that wasn't so bad, was it?"

links.title: Authority: "It's not the worst indignity you've..."
links.text: It's not the worst indignity you've suffered the last several days, but it is up there.

links.title: You: "(Through gritted teeth.) "Oink.""
links.text: (Through gritted teeth.) "Oink."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Well, well. Seems like we're deali..."
links.text: "Well, well. Seems like we're dealing with one tough pig. I'm impressed..."

links.title: Composure: "Yes, somehow you managed to oink wi..."
links.text: Yes, somehow you managed to oink with at least a modicum of dignity.

links.title: You: ""Do you know where to find him?""
links.text: "Do you know where to find him?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I might.""
links.text: "I might."

links.title: You: ""Will you tell me?""
links.text: "Will you tell me?"

links.title: You: ""My nose told me that you're also a..."
links.text: "My nose told me that you're also a communist. We should team up, join forces."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Well, well. Sounds like quite the..."
links.text: "Well, well. Sounds like quite the snout you've got there..."

links.title: Perception (Smell): "Your olfactory department wants you..."
links.text: Your olfactory department wants you to know that it accepts no responsibility for wherever this line of interrogation leads you.

links.title: You: ""I'm searching for a bunch of *mole..."
links.text: "I'm searching for a bunch of *mole people*."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Pigs and moles, eh? Sounds like so..."
links.text: "Pigs and moles, eh? Sounds like something out of a children's fairy story."

links.title: You: ""It's not. It's very serious.""
links.text: "It's not. It's very serious."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Oh, did I hurt the very serious pi..."
links.text: "Oh, did I hurt the very serious pig's feelings?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Whatever. I know someone who's int..."
links.text: "Whatever. I know someone who's into some pretty underground stuff. You're looking for Steban."

links.title: You: ""I guess it does sound a little chi..."
links.text: "I guess it does sound a little childish when you say it like that."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yes, it really does...""
links.text: "Yes, it really does..."

links.title: You: ""I met your friend Steban.""
links.text: "I met your friend Steban."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I watched you go in, pig. You aren..."
links.text: "I watched you go in, pig. You aren't telling me anything new."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""So did you two fancy each other?""
links.text: "So did you two fancy each other?"

links.title: You: ""I don't know how to put it, but I..."
links.text: "I don't know how to put it, but I think we discovered something extra-physical together."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Stop, pig. You're gonna make me he..."
links.text: "Stop, pig. You're gonna make me heave..."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Anyway, at least you convinced him..."
links.text: "Anyway, at least you convinced him to put up the posters. Good to see the old king covered in proper slogans. I saw one old bird nearly faint coming out of the Frittte."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Anyway, I told him you'd never go..."
links.text: "Anyway, I told him you'd never go in for the posters. Shame. I had some really good ones all planned out."

links.title: You: ""He's a good comrade. Very advanced..."
links.text: "He's a good comrade. Very advanced, ideologically speaking."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""God, you even talk the same now. S..."
links.text: "God, you even talk the same now. Soon you'll be proofreading each other's homework..."

links.title: You: ""Well, we got into a little *physic..."
links.text: "Well, we got into a little *physical altercation*, but I think he got over it."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""At first I thought that was just U..."
links.text: "At first I thought that was just Uli putting me on, but then I saw Steb's cheek. You gave him a right love tap." She seems to approve.

links.title: You: ""Yeah, he's alright." (Shrug.)"
links.text: "Yeah, he's alright." (Shrug.)

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Heh. He was cooler before he start..."
links.text: "Heh. He was cooler before he started palling about with pigs..."

links.title: You: ""I'm looking to acquire some origin..."
links.text: "I'm looking to acquire some original art. Do you have anything?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What's that? The piggy's looking t..."
links.text: "What's that? The piggy's looking to get into the art market with a snappy business pitch?" Her eyes light up. "Watch out or you'll be auctioned off and face the chop!" She draws a line across her throat with a thumb.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant straightens his back..."
links.text: The lieutenant straightens his back, waiting to see where this is going.

links.title: Half Light: "The *happening*, it's happening!!"
links.text: The *happening*, it's happening!!

links.title: Drama: "Are we witnessing a performance, pe..."
links.text: Are we witnessing a performance, perhaps? Play along.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Relax, it's all part of her *image*..."
links.text: Relax, it's all part of her *image*.

links.title: Authority: "No one speaks to a police officer i..."
links.text: No one speaks to a police officer in that tone. Show the little missy here her place.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She stares at you, fearlessly, wait..."
links.text: She stares at you, fearlessly, waiting for a response.

links.title: You: "(Step back.) "Is this a... happenin..."
links.text: (Step back.) "Is this a... happening?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I don't do 'happenings', I like to..."
links.text: "I don't do 'happenings', I like to leave a *mark*." She looks at you as if she's ready to wound you, then stares at the red paint running down the wall.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""The whole point of graffito being..."
links.text: "The whole point of graffito being on the street is so *everyone* can see it. No charge -- expression for all."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "There has to be a way to convince h..."
links.text: There has to be a way to convince her... Everyone has a price.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Forget this *public* art. She must..."
links.text: Forget this *public* art. She must have something private and esoteric. Something that tormented her until she brought it into existence.

links.title: Empathy: "But how does she make a living? How..."
links.text: But how does she make a living? How does she keep a roof over her head? It must be hard.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "I bet it's all about the scene for..."
links.text: I bet it's all about the scene for her. Tell her you can introduce her to some artsy jet-setters in Saint-Batiste. Maybe do some lines together in the powder room.

links.title: You: ""I'm after something a little more..."
links.text: "I'm after something a little more challenging. I have an Actual Art Degree, after all."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I thought you were a pig?" She squ..."
links.text: "I thought you were a pig?" She squashes her nose with a thumb so it resembles a snout.

links.title: You: ""Both police work and art criticism..."
links.text: "Both police work and art criticism require analytical talent and informed judgement calls."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Ooh, little piggy knows the big wo..."
links.text: "Ooh, little piggy knows the big words. What a waste of a perfectly good saucisson, stuffing it full of artspeak."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Sorry, even with your fancy degree..."
links.text: "Sorry, even with your fancy degree, you've got nothing to offer me."

links.title: You: ""No, I'm an Art Cop. I chase down w..."
links.text: "No, I'm an Art Cop. I chase down works of lazy derivation in the heated battle for original aesthetics."

links.title: You: ""Yes, I'm a pig, but only if we dec..."
links.text: "Yes, I'm a pig, but only if we decide to deconstruct what it *means* to be a pig."

links.title: You: ""Don't you have anything personal?..."
links.text: "Don't you have anything personal? Show me your most conceptual *chef-d'oeuvre*."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I don't do 'personal', if that's w..."
links.text: "I don't do 'personal', if that's what you sickos are after. No navel-gazing pieces about what it means to be 'me'."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""No one cares, I know I don't. So s..."
links.text: "No one cares, I know I don't. So sod off, pig! You've got nothing to change my mind."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Perfect, she isn't interested," th..."
links.text: "Perfect, she isn't interested," the lieutenant murmurs to himself, "all the more reason to move on from this little side task."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Your partner here gets it. Anythin..."
links.text: "Your partner here gets it. Anything else I can *not* do for you, gentlemen?" She gives you both a mischievous smile.

links.title: You: ""If all your art is free, how do yo..."
links.text: "If all your art is free, how do you make a living?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You call this a living?" She gestu..."
links.text: "You call this a living?" She gestures to her surroundings. "Look around you, hog-man, we're all bleeding out on the slab."

links.title: Empathy: "This place might be rotten, but at..."
links.text: This place might be rotten, but at least it's hers.

links.title: You: ""But you feel at home here, right?..."
links.text: "But you feel at home here, right? Besides, there's nowhere else to go."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "A strong gust of wind knocks into h..."
links.text: A strong gust of wind knocks into her. Then she shouts: "So what, pig? You gonna mock me now? I don't need this."

links.title: Shivers: "Nearby, a hoarse bark barrels throu..."
links.text: Nearby, a hoarse bark barrels through an alleyway that sits between two monstrous squats. No one walks down there anymore, but the nostrils of those who pass by in wet weather still detect the sickly scent of gasohol and burnt hair.

links.title: You: ""Let me in. Let me hear what you ha..."
links.text: "Let me in. Let me hear what you have to say."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Fuck outta here," she bursts out l..."
links.text: "Fuck outta here," she bursts out laughing. "This 'let's get through this together' type of stuff doesn't work on me. Especially if it's coming from a pig!"

links.title: You: "(Don't push her.) "Okay, okay. I'll..."
links.text: (Don't push her.) "Okay, okay. I'll back off."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Good call, piggo." She smiles to h..."
links.text: "Good call, piggo." She smiles to herself, satisfied.

links.title: You: ""One day something will come along..."
links.text: "One day something will come along and pull you out of the muck."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What, like your feeble business of..."
links.text: "What, like your feeble business offer? Are you going to be the turning point in my shitty life story? A little fairy from above?"

links.title: You: ""I'm sorry to hear that. I can only..."
links.text: "I'm sorry to hear that. I can only imagine the horrors you've seen."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""'I can only imagine the horrors,'"..."
links.text: "'I can only imagine the horrors,'" she mocks you in a squeaky voice. "I'm not your Channel 8 charity case. Sod off! No one here needs saving."

links.title: You: ""If you sell me a piece, I can intr..."
links.text: "If you sell me a piece, I can introduce you to some people. Free wine, celebrities, some sniff..."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""If I wanted to whore myself out fo..."
links.text: "If I wanted to whore myself out for some *Nasenbonbon*, I'd go to Porta Rosa. Or better yet, I'd take you with me and pimp you out to some friends of mine."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""They'd be delighted to get their h..."
links.text: "They'd be delighted to get their hands on a squealing pink thing like you," she hisses. "Cut off your ears, make some pig soup out of them. Now sod off! You've got nothing to offer that would make me change my mind."

links.title: You: ""Alright, quit playing, tell me the..."
links.text: "Alright, quit playing, tell me the price. I can make you rich and successful."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I don't have a price. If I wanted..."
links.text: "I don't have a price. If I wanted to whore myself out, I'd go to Porta Rosa. Or better yet, I'd take you with me and pimp you out to some friends of mine."

links.title: You: ""I'm not a pig. I am *The Law*. Sho..."
links.text: "I'm not a pig. I am *The Law*. Show me what you're selling or I will shake you down."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, we will not shake anyone down..."
links.text: "No, we will not shake anyone down today," the lieutenant clears up, his voice calm and measured.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Words are one thing, but he's not l..."
links.text: Words are one thing, but he's not letting you follow through with it.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Don't come at me with that. You've..."
links.text: "Don't come at me with that. You've got nuthin' on me. Not a pork scratching."

links.title: You: ""Fine. Whatever. I'll let it slide,..."
links.text: "Fine. Whatever. I'll let it slide, but only because I'm interested in your art."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Too bad, pork sausage, I don't sel..."
links.text: "Too bad, pork sausage, I don't sell my art. The whole point of graffito being on the street is so *everyone* can see it. No charge -- expression for all."

links.title: You: "(Pretend you're a pig stuck in a ca..."
links.text: (Pretend you're a pig stuck in a cage.) "Help, let me out. I don't want to DIE!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Whoa! Calm it with that shit, cop...."
links.text: "Whoa! Calm it with that shit, cop. I don't have any art you can buy. Geez."

links.title: You: ""Perfect, this is all very *on-bran..."
links.text: "Perfect, this is all very *on-brand* for you. Love that little persona you've created."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""This 'little persona' will grind y..."
links.text: "This 'little persona' will grind you into a sausage if you don't stop. I'm not a sellout."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What's that? The piggy's looking t..."
links.text: "What's that? The piggy's looking to get into the art market?" Her eyes light up. "Watch out or you'll be auctioned off and face the chop!" She draws a line across her throat with a thumb.

links.title: You: "(Whip out your finger pistols.) "It..."
links.text: (Whip out your finger pistols.) "It's your lucky day! I'm looking to acquire some original art by the *crme de la crme*."

links.title: You: "Convince her to show you her art."
links.text: Convince her to show you her art.

links.title: Suggestion: "Sure, she's all draped up in ironic..."
links.text: Sure, she's all draped up in ironic detachment, but everyone's gotta eat.

links.title: You: ""I do have something to offer in ex..."
links.text: "I do have something to offer in exchange for your art. Money."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Great, the little foray into the a..."
links.text: "Great, the little foray into the art world continues," murmurs the lieutenant, looking up.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "His words are hiding a tinge of exc..."
links.text: His words are hiding a tinge of excitement -- he's not so detached from your pursuits after all.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Blah-blah. I already told you, I'm..."
links.text: "Blah-blah. I already told you, I'm not for sale, piggo." She looks almost disappointed by your lousy offer.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Told you! Told you these artist-typ..."
links.text: Told you! Told you these artist-types repel wealth.

links.title: Suggestion: "Turn it around -- it's the seller w..."
links.text: Turn it around -- it's the seller who wields the power in this relationship.

links.title: You: ""Really? You're just going to let g..."
links.text: "Really? You're just going to let go of a chance to milk some stupid piggo rolling in cash?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Uh-oh, you're manipulating me!" Sh..."
links.text: "Uh-oh, you're manipulating me!" She sounds almost fascinated by this discovery. "I do like a chance to rip off some stupid piggos. And I need a pack of cigarettes. And some paint."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Okay, whatever, piggy. Time to lee..."
links.text: "Okay, whatever, piggy. Time to leech off each other like the parasites we are. Let me see what I've got..." She reaches into her heavy coat and pulls out a small piece of plastic coated thick with emulsion.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "Even the lieutenant leans in closer..."
links.text: Even the lieutenant leans in closer to inspect the work.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Here. Happy?" The plastic looks sa..."
links.text: "Here. Happy?" The plastic looks sad and damaged, as if it's been ripped out of some bigger piece. A glitzy barnacle of colours covers its surface.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Interesting. You can immediately se..."
links.text: Interesting. You can immediately see multiple ways to interpret this piece. What is the *experience* that the artist is trying to create? What *bodies* and *spaces* are they seeking to explore?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It looks like a palette. Nothing mo..."
links.text: It looks like a palette. Nothing more than a board for mixing paint.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Remember, this is a *buyer's* marke..."
links.text: Remember, this is a *buyer's* market. You're the one who's in charge of pricing.

links.title: You: ""I don't care what you sell me and..."
links.text: "I don't care what you sell me and I don't care what you do with your money. It's your choice."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Blah-blah. I'm not for sale, piggo..."
links.text: "Blah-blah. I'm not for sale, piggo." She looks almost disappointed by your lousy offer.

links.title: Suggestion: "Try as you might, you just can't fa..."
links.text: Try as you might, you just can't fathom what a young rebel dressed like a granny would want from you. She certainly isn't a flowers and chocolate kinda girl.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "Cindy picks the dirt out of her fin..."
links.text: Cindy picks the dirt out of her fingernails as you stand there, quiet and clueless. Without looking up, she says: "Ask something or piss off, swine."

links.title: Suggestion: "Humiliation wasn't enough for her?..."
links.text: Humiliation wasn't enough for her? How about you offer her something -- like a job?

links.title: You: ""How would you like a job? I can ge..."
links.text: "How would you like a job? I can get you one. A real job with a wage!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Fuck-a-doodle-doo!" She stifles an..."
links.text: "Fuck-a-doodle-doo!" She stifles an outburst of laughter. "And what job would that be? Cutting you into rashers?"

links.title: You: "(Point at Joyce.) "*She* could empl..."
links.text: (Point at Joyce.) "*She* could employ you. She works for the people who own the harbour."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She hisses at the boat rocking gent..."
links.text: She hisses at the boat rocking gently on the coastal waves. "She'd flay my skin. Wear me like a mink the first chance she got." A mad grin spreads across her face. "Unless I got to her first."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Is that all you've got, piggy? Loo..."
links.text: "Is that all you've got, piggy? Looks like the job market has failed me *once again*." Wind howls between the nearby apartment blocks. "No job, no art. What a pity."

links.title: You: ""The Whirling-in-Rags just lost one..."
links.text: "The Whirling-in-Rags just lost one of its staff."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Oh really?" Her eyes flash like st..."
links.text: "Oh really?" Her eyes flash like stolen coins under moonlight. "Good to know. That makes even easier pickings."

links.title: You: ""I know the leader of the Union. Be..."
links.text: "I know the leader of the Union. Bet they need an extra hand around the docks."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Oh, I *know* they need an extra ha..."
links.text: "Oh, I *know* they need an extra hand. Especially after that cargo went mysteriously missing last week."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you know something about that?"..."
links.text: "Do you know something about that?" asks the lieutenant. His question goes ignored.

links.title: You: ""The guy who owns the pawnshop coul..."
links.text: "The guy who owns the pawnshop could probably find you some odd jobs to do."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""You think he'd allow me back into..."
links.text: "You think he'd allow me back into his store? No chance. Not unless he wanted to lose his stock all of a sudden."

links.title: You: ""You could work behind the counter..."
links.text: "You could work behind the counter at the local Frittte? Seems easy enough."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I think you mean *boring*." She sc..."
links.text: "I think you mean *boring*." She scowls. "Can't anyway. Technically, I'm banned. Not that it's ever stopped me getting my cigs."

links.title: You: ""You could work for me! Be a police..."
links.text: "You could work for me! Be a police officer."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We have a policy that means we can..."
links.text: "We have a policy that means we cannot hire any SKULL members onto the force."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Me -- a brickman? I haven't got th..."
links.text: "Me -- a brickman? I haven't got the snout necessary to snuffle around your filthy yard." She spits out her tongue.

links.title: Suggestion: "What does she need? You don't have..."
links.text: What does she need? You don't have much to give her. Hmm, you could try offering her a job.

links.title: Suggestion: "She's locked up tight. What does sh..."
links.text: She's locked up tight. What does she want? Maybe it's as simple as asking her. But whine about it so she feels superior.

links.title: You: ""Come on! Isn't there any other way..."
links.text: "Come on! Isn't there any other way I can prove myself worthy?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Squeal. Then maybe we can talk bus..."
links.text: "Squeal. Then maybe we can talk business."
