links.title: You: "(Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, you..."
links.text: (Turn to the lieutenant.) "Kim, you do it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant remains perfectly st..."
links.text: The lieutenant remains perfectly still except to give you a devastating case of side-eye.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Not in a million years."
links.text: Not in a million years.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Not him -- you. I want *you* to sq..."
links.text: "Not him -- you. I want *you* to squeal for me, pork chop."

links.title: You: "(Squeal, but only a little.) "Reeeh..."
links.text: (Squeal, but only a little.) "Reeeh."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Come on! You really need to bring..."
links.text: "Come on! You really need to bring home the bacon." She chuckles.

links.title: You: "(Squeal a moderate amount.) "Reeehk..."
links.text: (Squeal a moderate amount.) "Reeehk, reeehk!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Do I need to come over there and p..."
links.text: "Do I need to come over there and pull on your curly tail? Squeal already!" She grins with power.

links.title: You: "(Squeal ignominiously.) "*Reeehk!*..."
links.text: (Squeal ignominiously.) "*Reeehk!* *Reeehk!* *Reeehk!*"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Good little piglet," she says with..."
links.text: "Good little piglet," she says with words coated in butter.

links.title: You: ""No way. Forget it." (Chicken out.)"
links.text: "No way. Forget it." (Chicken out.)

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Awww, c'mon! I was just starting t..."
links.text: "Awww, c'mon! I was just starting to have some fun."

links.title: You: ""I want to see your painting again.""
links.text: "I want to see your painting again."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Sure, piggo." She reaches into her..."
links.text: "Sure, piggo." She reaches into her heavy coat and pulls out a small piece of plastic coated thick with emulsion.

links.title: You: ""Show it to me." (Study it closer.)"
links.text: "Show it to me." (Study it closer.)

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "She juts out her hand, letting you..."
links.text: She juts out her hand, letting you examine the piece. Three red splotches have been shot at a diagonal across the surface. Tinier spots of various colours fan out from the same point of origin.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Well, piggo, what do you make of i..."
links.text: "Well, piggo, what do you make of it?" She sounds almost mocking, waiting for your reaction.

links.title: Conceptualization: "There's tension in these strokes of..."
links.text: There's tension in these strokes of genius, a desire to step into a dialogue with the viewer, to provoke them. A meditation on... *Sein und Nichtsein*?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "As said before, it's a palette. Not..."
links.text: As said before, it's a palette. Nothing to see here.

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "The angle of the paint drops reveal..."
links.text: The angle of the paint drops reveals that they were fired at the canvas with the force of a hand cannon.

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's one of those ink-blot tests. A..."
links.text: It's one of those ink-blot tests. An invitation to connect with the *divine*.

links.title: You: ""You're exploring the liminal space..."
links.text: "You're exploring the liminal space between being and unbeing. A cunning juxtaposition."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yeah, whatever, Art Cop." A wide s..."
links.text: "Yeah, whatever, Art Cop." A wide smile crosses her face. "Spaces, bodies, shit. Hit me with that lingo!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yeah, whatever." A wide smile cros..."
links.text: "Yeah, whatever." A wide smile crosses her face. "Spaces, bodies, shit. Hit me with that lingo!"

links.title: You: ""It's just a mixing palette.""
links.text: "It's just a mixing palette."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Damn." She's almost ready to aband..."
links.text: "Damn." She's almost ready to abandon the entire endeavour, but then changes her mind. "Well, it's also *art*. It's a conceptual illusion. Both the tool and the outcome."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Tool? Maybe she's onto something af..."
links.text: Tool? Maybe she's onto something after all. Athletes are simultaneously tools and artists -- bodies chiselled to a singular purpose.

links.title: You: ""Someone got killed here. A five mi..."
links.text: "Someone got killed here. A five millimetre calibre, point-blank range."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Yes, my artistic integrity." It's..."
links.text: "Yes, my artistic integrity." It's impossible to tell whether she's being serious or not.

links.title: Empathy: "She is. Despite the demeanour, play..."
links.text: She is. Despite the demeanour, playing this game brings no joy to her. She cares about art and her private relationship to it.

links.title: You: ""I see... blood-clot coins placed a..."
links.text: "I see... blood-clot coins placed as offering to a pulsing threshold. But what does it *mean*?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""It's a sign! Better pay up or you'..."
links.text: "It's a sign! Better pay up or you'll anger the terrible beast from... what did you say?" She knows -- she just wants to ham it up. "The *threshold*. Careful now, I heard it has a soft spot for smoked pork."

links.title: Drama: "Hmph, her improv skills could do wi..."
links.text: Hmph, her improv skills could do with some work. That was a *pathetic* performance. Are we supposed to be scared? NONE OF US ARE SCARED!

links.title: You: ""I don't really have an opinion.""
links.text: "I don't really have an opinion."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Of course you don't. Why do I even..."
links.text: "Of course you don't. Why do I even bother? Just cough up the money!"

links.title: Physical Instrument: "It looks like a palette. Nothing mo..."
links.text: It looks like a palette. Nothing more than a board for mixing paint.

links.title: You: ""Would you describe this as one of..."
links.text: "Would you describe this as one of your signature pieces?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""*Signature*? Oh yeah, pigster. I s..."
links.text: "*Signature*? Oh yeah, pigster. I sneezed while holding a wet brush. Paint flecked onto the canvas, and voila. You don't get more signature than that."

links.title: Half Light: "Is that all she thinks it takes to..."
links.text: Is that all she thinks it takes to be an artist? Outperform her with her own style. Make it *yours*.

links.title: You: "(Tickle the longest of your nasal h..."
links.text: (Tickle the longest of your nasal hairs.)

links.title: Half Light: "You feel the biggest sneeze of your..."
links.text: You feel the biggest sneeze of your life itching its way to the centre of your face...

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Uh, what are you doing...?" She lo..."
links.text: "Uh, what are you doing...?" She looks disgusted, her individual facial features racing to be the most dramatic expression of her disapproval.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant furrows his brow at..."
links.text: The lieutenant furrows his brow at another one of your eccentricisms.

links.title: You: ""I'm an artist too." (Your nostrils..."
links.text: "I'm an artist too." (Your nostrils flare involuntarily.)

links.title: Half Light: "You tilt your head back, close your..."
links.text: You tilt your head back, close your eyes, and get ready to snap it all forward...

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: "The coat gets flung over her head a..."
links.text: The coat gets flung over her head as she braces for impact.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is desperately searc..."
links.text: The lieutenant is desperately searching for another handkerchief.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant is desperately searc..."
links.text: The lieutenant is desperately searching for a handkerchief.

links.title: Drama: "The pre-sneeze hype is unreal."
links.text: The pre-sneeze hype is unreal.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "The mucous gripping the sides of yo..."
links.text: The mucous gripping the sides of your nostrils is cheering. All scents and odours seem to have left the world; your nasal chambers have become wind tunnels of *very* ticklish particles.

links.title: You: ""AHHH--""
links.text: "AHHH--"

links.title: Half Light: "But the rest doesn't come. You exha..."
links.text: But the rest doesn't come. You exhale softly -- no spittle, no shout. It's over. Just like that.

links.title: Conceptualization: "Perhaps not *everyone* is an artist..."
links.text: Perhaps not *everyone* is an artist after all.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Was that it?" She looks relieved...."
links.text: "Was that it?" She looks relieved. "Stop playing with your snout and let's get on with this so you can go back to your stinky sty. You still want this painting or what?"

links.title: You: ""Nothing. Nothing! Khm..." (Stop th..."
links.text: "Nothing. Nothing! Khm..." (Stop the sneeze while you still can.)

links.title: You: ""An exquisite commentary on the pre..."
links.text: "An exquisite commentary on the precious serendipity of the creative process."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""If you say so. I like to think tha..."
links.text: "If you say so. I like to think that my trigeminal nerve painted it."

links.title: You: ""Interesting. What I really want to..."
links.text: "Interesting. What I really want to know is -- what do you call this new style?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Art-ishoo.""
links.text: "Art-ishoo."

links.title: You: ""That's disgusting.""
links.text: "That's disgusting."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Says you." She looks you up and do..."
links.text: "Says you." She looks you up and down.

links.title: You: ""So you painted this with a sneeze?..."
links.text: "So you painted this with a sneeze? Truly remarkable... a clear sign of a *genius*!"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""That's what I said, piglet.""
links.text: "That's what I said, piglet."

links.title: You: ""Let's talk about the price again.""
links.text: "Let's talk about the price again."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""What about it?" She tilts her head..."
links.text: "What about it?" She tilts her head, waiting for your offer.

links.title: You: ""I can part with 50 rel.""
links.text: "I can part with 50 rel."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Not bad! I guess I'll take it." Sh..."
links.text: "Not bad! I guess I'll take it." She holds back her excitement as she gives you the painting.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Splendid! Your first physical asset..."
links.text: Splendid! Your first physical asset. But no time to stop -- money grows old unless it keeps moving. You need to find a *buyer*, preferably someone who will pay a high price for such an *exclusive* piece from a local artist.

links.title: You: "What about Joyce? She's wealthy."
links.text: What about Joyce? She's wealthy.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Nah, she'd probably send the entire..."
links.text: Nah, she'd probably send the entire Wild Pines legal team after you if she knew you were trading goods around their harbour. She's ready and poised for a *hostile takeover*.

links.title: You: "I could sell it to Garte, hang it u..."
links.text: I could sell it to Garte, hang it up in the Whirling-in-Rags.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "And become a small-time art peddler..."
links.text: And become a small-time art peddler? No, think bigger.

links.title: You: "Evrart can buy it on behalf of the..."
links.text: Evrart can buy it on behalf of the Union.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Hmm, doing business with communist..."
links.text: Hmm, doing business with communist dictatorships only works if you've got long-term plans in place... which you don't.

links.title: You: "The Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy see..."
links.text: The Mega Rich Light-Bending Guy seems blindingly rich.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Good call. He's already handed over..."
links.text: Good call. He's already handed over 100 rel. Let's hustle him for even more *moolah*.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Good call. Sure, he said he doesn't..."
links.text: Good call. Sure, he said he doesn't carry much money on him, but he must have something else to trade. Let's hustle!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Good call. He's definitely the type..."
links.text: Good call. He's definitely the type who might be interested in art. Let's go hustle him and score us some extreme *moolah*.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Good call. He certainly seems the t..."
links.text: Good call. He certainly seems the type. Let's go hustle him and score us some extreme *moolah*.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Look at us, coming to an agreement..."
links.text: "Look at us, coming to an agreement. Who'd have thought?" A breeze blows strands of hair across her forehead as she leans into the balustrade.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Anything else you want? I'm in a g..."
links.text: "Anything else you want? I'm in a good mood -- but it won't last long."

links.title: You: "This place isn't exactly bursting w..."
links.text: This place isn't exactly bursting with rich people.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "That blindingly rich guy is certain..."
links.text: That blindingly rich guy is certainly the type. He's already handed over 100 rel. Let's hustle him for even more *moolah*.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "That blindingly rich guy is the typ..."
links.text: That blindingly rich guy is the type. Sure, he said he doesn't carry much money on him, but he must have something else to trade. Let's hustle!

links.title: Savoir Faire: "That high-net-worth individual -- w..."
links.text: That high-net-worth individual -- wasn't he an investor? Let's go convince him to buy some *exclusive* local art.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "That blindingly rich guy seems the..."
links.text: That blindingly rich guy seems the type, the one you met in a container? Let's go hustle him and score us some extreme *moolah*.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "There must be *someone* around here..."
links.text: There must be *someone* around here with heavy pockets and an interest in the local art. Tell you what, have a wander round and I'll let you know if I hear any wealth.

links.title: You: "Wait, you can *hear* wealth?"
links.text: Wait, you can *hear* wealth?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Yes, if you know what to listen for..."
links.text: Yes, if you know what to listen for. That's what happens when you've been in the game for as long as I have. Your senses get *tuned in* to more opportune frequencies.

links.title: You: "Okay, where's a good place to start..."
links.text: Okay, where's a good place to start looking?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "I got some vibes from that person i..."
links.text: I got some vibes from that person inside the container you unlocked in the harbour. Why didn't you speak to them before? Let's head over there right now and fix that.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "I got some vibes from that containe..."
links.text: I got some vibes from that container you moved with the crane in the harbour. Let's see what's inside. There isn't a door yet that Savvy's VIP status couldn't open.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "I got some vibes from the harbour...."
links.text: I got some vibes from the harbour. Let's explore that area again. Who knows what we might find hidden among all those shipping containers.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "We haven't got into the harbour yet..."
links.text: We haven't got into the harbour yet. Let's worm our way in and scope it out. Some of the best things in life come inside shipping containers.

links.title: You: ""I'll pay 25 rel.""
links.text: "I'll pay 25 rel."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Alright. Can't complain about that..."
links.text: "Alright. Can't complain about that. You've got yourself a deal." She gives you the painting.

links.title: You: ""How about 10 rel?""
links.text: "How about 10 rel?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""That it? Alright. It all helps." S..."
links.text: "That it? Alright. It all helps." She gives you the painting.

links.title: You: ""I have more questions about the pa..."
links.text: "I have more questions about the painting."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Ask away.""
links.text: "Ask away."

links.title: You: ""How much do you want for it?""
links.text: "How much do you want for it?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Sixty seven thousand rel. And you..."
links.text: "Sixty seven thousand rel. And your head on a silver tray."

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Remember, this isn't about the art..."
links.text: Remember, this isn't about the art or the artist -- this needless purchase implies your *excessive wealth*. Art comes across as more tasteful than simply hanging cash on the wall.

links.title: Empathy: "She may antagonize you but she's st..."
links.text: She may antagonize you but she's still a struggling artist with no prospects. She *needs* as much money as you can give.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Lowball her. The wretched are used..."
links.text: Lowball her. The wretched are used to rolling with the punches.

links.title: You: ""Let's come back to this later.""
links.text: "Let's come back to this later."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Suit yourself." She tucks away the..."
links.text: "Suit yourself." She tucks away the painting and closes her coat. You hear waves breaking on the nearby shore.

links.title: You: ""Catch you later, Cindy." [Leave.]"
links.text: "Catch you later, Cindy." [Leave.]

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Watch your back, ungulate. You've..."
links.text: "Watch your back, ungulate. You've got eyes on you."

links.title: Perception (Smell): "That smell coming from her paint bu..."
links.text: That smell coming from her paint bucket -- it's not paint, it's heavy fuel oil.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Red-dyed heavy fuel oil is only use..."
links.text: Red-dyed heavy fuel oil is only used in government vehicles. Or at least that's the idea.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "That isn't a fresh paint smell comi..."
links.text: That isn't a fresh paint smell coming from the wall. She's using heavy fuel oil.

dialogueTree.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""The streets will flow red once mor..."
dialogueTree.text: "The streets will flow red once more. A great torrent, rushing down Rue d'Esperance. You wait and see." The girl stares at the sailboat by the pier.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""The streets will not flow red with..."
links.text: "The streets will not flow red with anything. Who are you?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""I'm Cindy the fucking SKULL -- wha..."
links.text: "I'm Cindy the fucking SKULL -- what else do you want to know? Date of birth? Blood type? The last time I was tested for Hep C?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "This is the Cindy that misters 'Pis..."
links.text: This is the Cindy that misters 'Piss' and 'Fuck' said had the armoured gloves. Play it cool now...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Something about skulls, gloves... w..."
links.text: Something about skulls, gloves... what was it? Maybe it'll come to you later.

links.title: You: ""I just want to know your name, lit..."
links.text: "I just want to know your name, little lady. No need to get defensive."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""And here I was trying to be polite..."
links.text: "And here I was trying to be polite. Just can't win with you pigs." Despite the sass, she puts the brush aside.

links.title: Suggestion: "She's grown frustrated with her wor..."
links.text: She's grown frustrated with her work and welcomes the opportunity to challenge authority in other ways.

links.title: Conceptualization: "A brush -- an artist? The red splat..."
links.text: A brush -- an artist? The red splatter is... urban expressionism?

links.title: You: ""Don't use that tone with me. I am..."
links.text: "Don't use that tone with me. I am the law."

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Sod off, pig man. Art is above the..."
links.text: "Sod off, pig man. Art is above the law." Despite the sass, she puts the brush aside.

links.title: You: ""Let's start with your blood type a..."
links.text: "Let's start with your blood type and go from there."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Go where? Accosting a minor?""
links.text: "Go where? Accosting a minor?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Listen to your partner, pig man. K..."
links.text: "Listen to your partner, pig man. Keep your grubby hooves off little old ladies." Despite the attitude, she puts the brush aside.

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Will you look at that! He's not ju..."
links.text: "Will you look at that! He's not just a pig, he's also a dog. Ain't got no bones for you, doggie." Despite the sass, she puts the brush aside and turns to you.

links.title: You: ""Hep. Yeah, when were you last test..."
links.text: "Hep. Yeah, when were you last tested?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Had a battery of tests just last w..."
links.text: "Had a battery of tests just last week. I'm practically a patchwork of interesting critters. Kind of like a man o' war." Despite the attitude, she puts the brush aside.

links.title: You: ""Just answer some questions okay?""
links.text: "Just answer some questions okay?"

links.title: Cindy the SKULL: ""Ask away, pig man, but I don't pro..."
links.text: "Ask away, pig man, but I don't promise to answer." Despite the sass, she puts the brush aside.

links.title: You: ""What's your name, miss? You seem t..."
links.text: "What's your name, miss? You seem to be engaged in an illegal activity."

links.title: You: ""You seem pretty cool. Who are you?""
links.text: "You seem pretty cool. Who are you?"

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]
